meanings.definition: A type of rock consisting of jasper and magnetite.
meanings.sent1: The geologist found a piece of jaspilites during the excavation.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed various jaspilites in their mineral collection.
meanings.sent3: The jaspilites in the quarry seemed to sparkle under the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The jaspilites in the cliff resembled a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent5: The miner described the jaspilites as a blend of colors and textures.

meanings.sent1: The collection included different types of jaspilites.
meanings.sent2: The jaspilites were heavy to carry back to the campsite.
meanings.sent3: The hikers stumbled upon a pile of jaspilites during their trek.
meanings.sent4: The field was covered in jaspilites, creating a unique landscape.
meanings.sent5: The jeweler crafted beautiful necklaces using jaspilites as the main gemstone.
